titles.title: SF310 Sing a song, sing a joyful song

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing a song, sing a joyful song,
sing a joyful song to celebrate!
Sing a song, sing a joyful song,
sing a joyful song to celebrate!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Clap your hands, clap your hands like this,
clap your hands like this to celebrate!
Clap your hands, clap your hands like this,
clap your hands like this to celebrate!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jump up and down, up and down and around,
up and down and around to celebrate!
Jump up and down, up and down and around,
up and down and around to celebrate!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Dance to the beat, to the beat of the drum,
to the beat of the drum to celebrate!
Dance to the beat, to the beat of the drum,
to the beat of the drum to celebrate!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Wave your hands, wave your hands in the air,
wave your hands in the air to celebrate!
Wave your hands, wave your hands in the air,
wave your hands in the air to celebrate!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus is alive, you know,
he's risen from the dead!
He was crucified
but now he's risen like he said.
(Hallelujah!)
